name: not_ringChar_dvd_of_invertible
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field K
t : Nat
inst✝ : Invertible ↑t
⊢ Not (Dvd.dvd (ringChar K) t)
decl:
theorem not_ringChar_dvd_of_invertible {t : ℕ} [Invertible (t : K)] : ¬ringChar K ∣ t := by
  rw [← ringChar.spec, ← Ne]
  exact Invertible.ne_zero (t : K)
